name: Order Up
description:
Born from a family with a long lineage of serving food, you are now a waiter mercenary hired by desperate restaurants that requires your skills and talent for a hefty price. But as a man of high caliber, you won't accept payment from your hirer. Instead, you assert dominance by earning income only from the tips given by customers. 

Move fast on your feet and fingerprints as you run, slide, and throw to serve hot delicious meal for your starving customers. Will you able to uphold your status as a professional?
